div.p: The below Deployment Diagram provides an overview of the software deliverables of a particular service component.

blockquote.blockquote: Any Web/Application Server component like Jetty, Tomcat, Oracle AS, WebLogic, WebSphere, etc. to deploy and manage the web applications.
A folder inside the web contaniner on which web applications are deployed.
A geotagger.war file (which stands for "web application archive" ) is a compressed file format for storing all the resources required to install and run a Web application in a single file.
This is a central servlet which intializes REST application and accepts web services API as request to generate response.
